<div class = "about_header"> Which gene ID's can I use? </div>

Currently only <a href="http://www.genenames.org"> HGNC-approved </a> gene symbols are supported.
<br/>

<div class = "about_header"> Can I download my results? </div>

Yes! this is strongly recommended for reproducibility.
<br/>
Once a run has completed, any abundance estimates, markers and plots can be downloaded from their respective tabs.
<br/>

<div class = "about_header"> Can I use the results for my publication? </div>

Of course! If you do so, please include references for any dataset(s) you have used and cite <a href="https://doi.org/10.1093/neuonc/noad021"> our paper</a>.
<br/>

<div class = "about_header"> I have more questions, how can I reach you? </div>

Further information can be found in the <b><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-info"></i> About</b> tab. Alternatively, you can contact us by <a href="mailto:umsaa@leeds.ac.uk"> email </a> or through social media.
